title: Depression watch IV
author: VD
content_html:
Another bankster bites the dust:

David Kellermann, acting chief financial officer of Freddie Mac, committed suicide in his Hunter Mill Estates home Wednesday morning.

And the nation rather conspicuously failed to shed any tears.
content_text:
Another bankster
bites the dust
:
David Kellermann, acting chief financial officer of Freddie Mac, committed suicide in his Hunter Mill Estates home Wednesday morning.
And the nation rather conspicuously failed to shed any tears.
